price: 4. Ye oyo azali koleisa bango o’tango ya nzala mpe kobatela bango na tango ya bobangi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
